text:
="preserve">Anthony Keith Villars (24 January 1952 – 9 September 2020) was a Welsh footballer. He was born in Pontypool, Wales. He made three appearances for the national team in 1974. From 1971 to 1976, he played for the Cardiff City F.C.. Between 1976 and 1977, he also played for the Newport County A.F.C..
Villars died on 9 September 2020 at the age of 68.
